channel.title: I am gonna save your life
channel.description:
by advising you to use SUNBLOCK this summer!
Spent like 5 hours in the pool today and now I am a lobster. This sucks so damn bad. I really can't wait till I feel better.
Share your stories/rants.
Gogogo

item.title: I am gonna save your life
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Should of listened to me I warned you. I got a great tan this summer.

Read full topic
item.source: I am gonna save your life

item.title: I am gonna save your life
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:32, topic:388233”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=484056.msg3546765#msg3546765 date=1301238223]

We got about 3 inches of snow the other day in Northern Lower Michigan. It was enough to get my last class of the day cancelled. Not so much because of the snow but because of the ice on the roads and it was really windy out which leads to bad conditions.

Anyways, fuck you! I want summer.

Fuck, in Lansing we didn’t get anything. They predicted a centimeter of ice and we got nothing.
[/quote]Lancing Indiana?[/quote]

Reaper ran out of pointless topic ideas, so were gonna start bringing back old ones.

Read full topic
item.source: I am gonna save your life

item.title: I am gonna save your life
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

That sucks dude, I went to Bali and I got sunburnt and I got scarred on my both shoulders. Plus I’ve been burnt here about 100+ times.

Read full topic

item.title: I am gonna save your life
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

My girlfriend and I fell asleep on the sand last summer and woke up to discover some nice beetroot red skin. Spent the next week in agony trying to take quick showers and avoid friendly slaps on the back. Don’t get cancer kids

Read full topic

item.title: I am gonna save your life
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:26, topic:388233”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=484056.msg3546363#msg3546363 date=1301206248]
I enjoy peeling the skin off my red body in large chunks, so no thanks.
[/quote]

Odd that, I think most people enjoy doing that to be honest. It feels satisfying. [/quote]I got a sunburn while camping on the back of my neck. The highlight of my week was at home looking in the mirror backwards, peeling my skin.

Mmm.

Read full topic
